name: Udstødt, en podcast om Jehovas Vidner

episodes.title: Christer Søderberg was disfellowshipped because of the use of snus! (Norwegian court case)
episodes.description:
Christer has a very interesting story and talks in this interview of the damage from his JW-indoctrination, even decades after leaving the organisation.
He was also present in the court room last friday and talks about his view of what happened.

episodes.title: #180: My first experience being in the court room - Watchtower vs Norway
episodes.description:
So today was the first big day for me. A short walk from my hotel is the Court house of Landsretten - The District Court - where the battle takes place between Watchtower and the Norwegian state.
Wow! What an experience!!!

Links:

episodes.title: Watchtower vs Norway 2024. Interviewing Patrick and Eydis
episodes.description:
I am in Oslo to cover the last days (of the last days) of the courtcase where Watchtower has sued the norwegian state for removing their status as an aproved religion.
The first people from the ex-jw community I have talked with, is Eydis from Iceland and Patrick from Belgium, who both were sitting in the court room, and observing what was going on.

Patrick has recently made this amzing website, called "Shunning Is A Crime".
Please check it out!
www.,shunningisacrime.org
